Network requirements: POSIX send() and recv(). API to supply your own replacement
Supported operating systems: AMX, BeOS, ChorusOS, DOS, eCOS, FreeRTOS/OpenRTOS, uItron, MVS, OS/2, Palm OS, QNX Neutrino, RTEMS, Tandem NonStop, ThreadX, uC/OS II, Unix (AIX, FreeBSD, HPUX, Linux, OS X, Solaris, etc.), VDK, VM/CMS, VxWorks, Win16, Win32, Win64, WinCE/PocketPC/etc, XMK

Network requirements: POSIX send() and recv(). API to supply your own replacement.
Thread safety: Thread-safe, needs custom mutex hooks if neither POSIX nor Windows threads are available.
Supported operating systems: Generally any POSIX platforms or Windows, commonly tested platforms include GNU/Linux, Win32/64, Mac OS X, Solaris, OpenWRT, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD.

Network requirements: POSIX read() and write(). API to supply your own replacement.
Thread safety: Threading layer available (POSIX or own hooks)
Random seed: Random seed set through entropy pool
Supported operating systems: Known to work on: Win32/64, Linux, Mac OS X, Solaris, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD, OpenWRT, iPhone (iOS), Xbox, Android, SeggerOS

Network requirements: NSPR PR_Send() and PR_Recv(). API to supply your own replacement.
Supported operating systems: AIX, Android, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD, BeOS, HP-UX, IRIX, Linux, Mac OS X, OS/2, Solaris, OpenVMS, Amiga DE, Windows, WinCE, Sony PlayStation
Unix, DOS (with djgpp), Windows, OpenVMS, MacOS, NetWare

Random seed: Random seed set through entropy pool and/or HW
Supported operating systems: INTEGRITY, MQX, SMX, ThreadX, VxWorks, SeggerOS, OSE, Android, Win 32/64, Linux 32/64, uCLinux, Mac OS X, OpenBSD, DD-WRT, OpenWrt

Network requirements: POSIX send() and recv(). API to supply your own replacement.
Thread safety: Thread-safe, needs mutex hooks if PThreads or WinThreads not available, can be turned off
Supported operating systems: Win32/64, Linux, Mac OS X, Solaris, ThreadX, VxWorks, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD, embedded Linux, Haiku, OpenWRT, iPhone (iOS), Android, Nintendo Wii and Gamecube through DevKitPro, QNX, MontaVista, OpenCL, NonStop, TRON/ITRON/µITRON, Micrium's µC OS, FreeRTOS, SafeRTOS, Freescale MQX, Nucleus, TinyOS, HP/UX, Keil RTX, TI-RTOS
